title: The Waiting House
description: Annabelle is a child living in a thriving community in a dystopian future.Her parents compete with one another for her attention and, unbeknownst to her, she has the undivided attention of some of the most important people in society-- maybe even the world.Today is an important day for Annabelle and her parents but tomorrow will be one of the most important days of her life. Tomorrow Annabelle will go home.
author: T.C. Middlesex
